# <a name="create-an-email-signature-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="eebfe-102">Een e-mailhandtekening maken in de webversie van Outlook</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="eebfe-102">Create an email signature in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="eebfe-103">Ga naar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="eebfe-103">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="eebfe-104">**Instellingen** > **Bekijk alle Outlook-instellingen** > Opstellen en**beantwoorden**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="eebfe-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Compose and reply**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="eebfe-105">Typ **onder E-mailhandtekening**uw handtekening en gebruik de beschikbare opmaakopties om het uiterlijk te wijzigen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="eebfe-105">Under **Email signature**, type your signature and use the available formatting options to change its appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="eebfe-106">*Let op:* U slechts één handtekening per account hebben.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="eebfe-106">*Note:* You can have only one signature per account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="eebfe-107">Zie [Een e-mailhandtekening maken en toevoegen in de webversie van Outlook voor](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3)meer informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="eebfe-107">To learn more, see [Create and add an email signature in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span></span>
